name: commands
description: Displays a list of available commands.

arguments.name: command
arguments.description: The command to display help information for

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: The directory in which to create the project

sort.description: Sets the sort order for the output

values.Name: The project's name
values.Creation Date: The date and time the project was created
values.Last Modified: The date and time the project was last modified
values.Region: The region associated with the project's ISO
values.Location: The path to the project's directory
